name: Luster
description:
All of CG in the game is not covered now.Thank you for playing！


This is a “Beautiful girl” and “Gem elimination" game.When you come to a different world, you have etheric energy to help the four goddesses adjust the balance of the elements of the sanctuary.At the same time, completing the adjustment of the elements in each area can also win the favor of the saints and the four goddesses, Fall in love with them and leave good memories ~

Gameplay:

Traditional gem elimination gameplay combined with unique element bomb;

1. Eliminating each element can accumulate elemental energy

2. Elemental bombs can be obtained by combining two different elements

3. Accumulate target element to complete element adjustment in this level

4. Strengthen yourself and unlock the plot with etheric elements
